forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 15 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the morning dawns with a serene clarity, as if the city itself has taken a deep breath, inviting the day to unfold gracefully. Mostly sunny skies stretch overhead, a brilliant canvas punctuated by vibrant hues that seem to weave promises of warmth, particularly as the sun arcs across the sky. Though the high will gently hover around 60 degrees, a fresh breeze from the west, brisk at times, whispers through the streets, carrying with it the salt of the sea and the energy of the city. 

As the afternoon approaches, temperatures will dip slightly, urging residents to embrace layers—perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater to fend off the cooling air. While the familiar marine layer may still linger along the coasts, its grip appears to have loosened sufficiently to allow for breathtaking vistas of the Golden Gate. This day, framed by clarity, beckons those who appreciate the nuanced charm of urban life; a stroll along the Embarcadero offers not just views, but an experience infused with the rhythm of the bustling city. The pleasant weather invites a quiet moment at a café, or perhaps the joy of discovering a hidden pocket of greenery in the city's many parks—an ideal day for those who seek warmth and light amidst the dynamic pulse of San Francisco.
